original_title: 百聞不如一見！SOD都是真的、帯大家体験情色文化的最先端―日本！改編自真実案例 影像介紹日本観光須注意事項全片中文発音 東京肉穴淫語痴女物語
overview: AVOP-404 is done by SOD, and the creativity is off the charts. The girls speak in Chinese for the whole video and the video it’s natively subtitled to Japanese. Swallow that.  It’s a tour video and cautionary tale of Japan for Chinese speakers, with an awesome intro and notes and rankings about the Japanese culture and lewds by a narrator.  Granted the girls speak Chinese in a very slow fashion, and a bit mechanic, and not so well. But we should understand the effort they have put in doing this. If they don’t speak Chinese so perfectly or fast so be it. I would kill for an English spoken version of such video.  The sex scenes themselves are very good. The stack of SOD cuties is awesome, and even Hatano Yui and Ootsuki Hibiki joined this. They actually have a scene together. Other than that, the Suzu scene was killer. And the one in the office worked too.
title: You Have To Check This Out! True Stories From SOD, From The Most Erotic Culture Ever, The Country Of Japan! Adapted From True Stories While Touring Japan, With Cautionary Notes In Chinese A Story Of Dirty Talk Slut Babes In Tokyo
